Html:
Hi,

I was asked to check if porting of GMAP (for WindowsForms) based application to Mac OS is possible. 

Did someone succeeded to compile GMAP with Mono on Mac OS X? Do you think it is possible?

Thank you,

Ilia

It somewhat hard since I don't have Mac machine in my possession at this moment. 

According to previous posts, GMap was successfully compiled on Linux. Taking this into account, do you see any reason for it not to compile on Mac?
nop, since mono is crossplatform, it should work well
